name: Mine Diamonds
description:
A simple card game where the goal is to remove all the cards in the diamonds. Click on two cards that add up to a value of 13 to clear them. Clear all the diamonds to complete a board. Go for a high score or complete daily missions to unlock new card backers in the shop.

Card vales:

Ace = 1

2-10 = Number on the card

Jack = 11

Queen = 12

King = 13

Game by Alec Holden
